availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Brewer (Henry County, ky, livery stable keeper)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, miller, keep of livery stable. Kentucky native. Son of John Brewer and Amanda Brewer. Married to Margaret Brewer. Father of Thomas F. Brewer, Amanda E. Brewer, Mary Jane Brewer, and Benjamin F. Brewer. Miller and student in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Keeper of livery stable in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 442B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 243.
